sub_fields.label: About Cards
sub_fields.message:
Cards

A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

If you’re familiar with Bootstrap 3, cards replace our old panels, wells, and thumbnails. Similar functionality to those components is available as modifier classes for cards.

Full details about Cards can seen here.

sub_fields.label: Select Content Editor
sub_fields.name: select_content_editor
sub_fields.instructions: Allows you to select to use the advanced 'Flexi Layouts' content editor or use the 'Standard' default Wordpress editor. Please Note: If you have any content in the 'Standard' content editor the page will display that over anything in the 'Flexi' editor.

sub_fields.instructions: Allows you to hide the page title from being displayed

sub_fields.message: Change the main content background colour or add an image?

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_colour
sub_fields.instructions:
• White = #ffffff
  • Yellow = #fdc400
  • Blue = #005CA8
  • Grey = #878787
